name: Accessibility
description: Diagnoses common accessibility problems affecting screen readers and other assistive technology.

results.name: testMenuRoleForRequiredChidren
results.description: Ensure that element of role "menu" and "menubar" have required owned elements in accordance with WAI-ARIA.

results.name: testGridRoleForRequiredChidren
results.description: Ensure that elements of role "grid" have required owned elements in accordance with WAI-ARIA.

results.name: testForAriaLabelledBySpelling
results.description: Ensure that "aria-labelledby" is spelled correctly.

results.name: testForMultipleBanners
results.description: Ensure that only one banner is used on the page.

results.name: testForLinkLabels
results.description: Ensure that links have accessible labels for assistive technology.

domNodes: html > body.limited-nav.base.page.basicpage > header > div.global-nav.outer > div.mobile-menu > div.global-nav.inner > div.container-fluid > div.main-nav-flex > a.logo[data-aa-header-logo="Logo Not Set"][href="/"][target="_self"]

results.name: testRowGroupRoleForRequiredChidren
results.description: Ensure that element of role "rowgroup" have required owned elements in accordance with WAI-ARIA.

results.name: testTableRoleForRequiredChidren
results.description: Ensure that elements of role "table" have required owned elements in accordance with WAI-ARIA.

results.name: testForMultipleLiveRegions
results.description: Ensure that only one live region is used on the page.

results.name: testListBoxRoleForRequiredChidren
results.description: Ensure that elements of role "listbox" have required owned elements in accordance with WAI-ARIA.

results.name: testImageLabels
results.description: Ensure that elements of role "img" have accessible labels for assistive technology.

domNodes: html > body.limited-nav.base.page.basicpage > header > div.global-nav.outer > div.mobile-menu > div.global-nav.inner > div.container-fluid > div.main-nav-flex > a.logo[data-aa-header-logo="Logo Not Set"][href="/"][target="_self"] > img[src="/content/dam/redcross/imported-images/redcross-logo.png.img.png"]

results.name: testForAriaHiddenFalse
results.description: Ensure aria-hidden="false" is not used.

results.name: testTreeRoleForRequiredChidren
results.description: Ensure that element of role "tree" have required owned elements in accordance with WAI-ARIA.

results.name: testRadioGroupRoleForRequiredChidren
results.description: Ensure that element of role "radiogroup" have required owned elements in accordance with WAI-ARIA.

results.name: testFeedRoleForRequiredChidren
results.description: Ensure that elements of role "feed" have required owned elements in accordance with WAI-ARIA.

results.name: testTabListRoleForRequiredChidren
results.description: Ensure that element of role "tablist" have required owned elements in accordance with WAI-ARIA.

results.name: testButtonLabels
results.description: Ensure that buttons have accessible labels for assistive technology.

domNodes: html > body.limited-nav.base.page.basicpage > main > div:nth-child(4) > div.section-control.parbase > div.section-control-container.column-container.background-white.top-padding-twenty.medium.jump-link-target.gutter-twenty[data-jump-link-analytics="jump link not set"] > div.box-shadow-container > div.container-fluid.main-content > div.row.justify-content-center > div.col-md-10.offset-md-1 > div.row > div.par-50.col-md-6.section-par.two-col-50-50.par-2 > div.create-account.parbase > div.sso-login-wrapper[data-context="login-portal-create-account"] > div.sso-input-container:nth-child(6) > select#countryInput.sso-login-form-input

results.name: testRowRoleForRequiredChidren
results.description: Ensure that elements of role "row" have required owned elements in accordance with WAI-ARIA.

results.name: testListRoleForRequiredChidren
results.description: Ensure that elements of role "list" have required owned elements in accordance with WAI-ARIA.

results.name: testComboBoxRoleForRequiredChidren
results.description: Ensure that elements of role "combobox" have required owned elements in accordance with WAI-ARIA.

results.name: testForMultipleMainContentSections
results.description: Ensure that only one main content section is used on the page.

results.name: testDialogsForLabels
results.description: Ensure that dialogs have accessible labels for assistive technology.

results.name: testForInvalidAriaHiddenValue
results.description: Ensure that values for "aria-hidden" are valid.
